Ensures the icon is properly displayed when network request blocking setting is enabled/disabled.

Is blocking: false
Does Not Have Icon

Is blocking: false
Does Not Have Icon

Is blocking: true
Has Icon

Is blocking: false
Does Not Have Icon

Network Module Loaded

Does Not Have Icon
